article.headline: Pacific 83, Long Beach St. 77
article.story: LONG BEACH, Calif. (AP) -- Steffan Johnson scored 19 points and five other Pacific players scored in double figures as the Tigers beat Long Beach State 83-77 on Thursday. Michael Nunnally scored 14 points and Anthony Brown had 13 points and 10 rebounds for the Tigers (11-4, 2-0 Big West), who have won five of six and have defeated the 49ers in nine of their last 11 meetings. Donavan Morris scored a career-high 32 points for Long Beach State (3-11, 0-3). Morris went 10-for-15 from the field and made four 3-pointers. Pacific went on an 18-0 run to turn a four-point deficit into a 54-40 lead with 11:23 to play. The 49ers cut the Pacific lead to 79-77 on a 3-pointer by Donavan Morris with 10.6 seconds left, but Johnson and Brown sank four free throws in the final seconds to seal the victory. Chad Troyer had 13 points, Bryan LeDuc scored 11 and Joe Ford added 10 points for Pacific.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
